doc.description: Digital camera control using radio channel. With this module you can take pictures using a radio channel. When you put the channel to max the picture are taken. If the channel goes high for more than 0.75s a picture is taken every 1sec. Only usable for fixedwing firmware.

define.name: DC_RADIO_SHOOT
define.description: specifies the channel to be used to trigger the camera by radio transmiter
